I create visual solutions with personality.

My name is Cole Townsend, and I am a designer. I love the process and result of creating aesthetic solutions to problems. I also study Art History at Williams College. I like chemex coffee, running, and napping — in that order. I think programming is cool, but don’t actually program that much. I’m always trying to learn new things, though. XCode and iOS development are on my shortlist.

I am currently unavailable for work, but I always reply to emails. Let’s talk.

Elsewhere

I write about all sorts of things, often design on my journal. I show off my latest work on Dribbble. You can find my open source projects, and this site, on Github.
